content: While thinking about expressions at work last night (instead of working... :P) I had the realization that temporaries and possibly move/copy are more about places themselves than about expressions. Would it make sense to have a chapter called "Places" in the memory model section that describes these alongside what actual kinds of places there are (local variables, statics, temporaries, (etc?))?

Like, as a hastily thought out outline:

# Places
## General definition
## Kinds of Places
### Statics
### Local Variables
### Temporaries
## Reading
### Moving/Copying
## Writing
### Mutability
### Drop?
